summary.purpose: Barrel export file for the forms module providing re-exports of ModularForm and its related components, plus three additional form components: ConfirmForm for confirmation dialogs, DatePicker for basic HTML date range selection, and DatePicker2 for accessible calendar-based date range selection using react-aria-components.
summary.problem_solved: Centralizes form exports for easier importing. Provides specialized form components including a confirmation dialog with customizable buttons/callbacks, a lightweight HTML5 date range picker, and an enhanced calendar-based date picker with popover support, accessibility features, and keyboard navigation.

external.why_used: Core hooks (useState) for loading state management in DatePicker and DatePicker2.

external.name: moment
external.why_used: Date formatting utility to generate default date values in YYYY-MM-DD format for HTML date inputs.

external.name: lucide-react
external.why_used: CalendarIcon for calendar trigger buttons in DatePicker2.

external.name: react-aria-components
external.why_used: Accessible date picker primitives (DatePicker, Dialog, Group, Label, Popover, Button, I18nProvider) for DatePicker2 accessibility and internationalization.

external.name: @internationalized/date
external.why_used: Date parsing and timezone utilities (parseDate, today, getLocalTimeZone) for converting string dates to DateValue objects in DatePicker2.

internal.why_used: Barrel re-exports ModularForm component and all related form elements and utilities.
GreenVSvg and RedXSvg icons for ConfirmForm button elements (default checkmark and X icons).
Loader component for loading state display during form submission in DatePicker and DatePicker2.
Type definitions for ConfirmFormProps and DatePickerProps interfaces.
cn utility for conditional CSS class merging in all components.
Calendar component for popover date selection in DatePicker2.
DateInput component wrapper from react-aria-components for accessible date text entry in DatePicker2.

symbols.name: ConfirmForm
symbols.description_one_line: Confirmation dialog with customizable headline, buttons, and callback handlers.

params.name: onV
params.description: Callback fired when confirm button is clicked. Can be async for loading state support.

params.name: onX
params.description: Callback fired when cancel button is clicked. Can be async for loading state support.

params.name: headline
params.description: Confirmation message displayed at the top of the dialog. Defaults to empty string.

params.name: direction
params.description: Text direction ('rtl' or 'ltr'). Defaults to 'rtl' (right-to-left).

params.name: containerClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the outer container. Default provides flex column layout with gaps.

params.name: headlineClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the headline text. Default provides large bold text.

params.name: buttonsContainerClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the buttons container. Default centers buttons horizontally with gap.

params.name: confirmButtonClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the confirm button. Default provides opacity and disabled cursor styling.

params.name: cancelButtonClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the cancel button. Default provides opacity and disabled cursor styling.

params.name: confirmButtonProps
params.description: Additional HTML button attributes passed to confirm button.

params.name: cancelButtonProps
params.description: Additional HTML button attributes passed to cancel button.

params.name: confirmElement
params.description: Custom React element for confirm button. Defaults to GreenVSvg (checkmark icon).

params.name: cancelElement
params.description: Custom React element for cancel button. Defaults to RedXSvg (X icon).

returns.description: Confirmation dialog with headline and two buttons.

details.what_it_does: Renders a modal-like confirmation dialog container with a headline at the top, followed by two buttons (confirm and cancel) centered below. The confirm button triggers onV callback, the cancel button triggers onX callback. Both buttons have default icons (green checkmark, red X) but can be customized via confirmElement and cancelElement props. The dialog always has padding and respects the direction prop for RTL layouts.
details.rendered_ui_description: Vertical container with 30px padding containing bold headline text at top, followed by centered horizontal button area with two interactive buttons separated by a small gap. Buttons have default styling with opacity and disabled state cursor handling.

minimal_correct.title: Basic confirmation dialog with callbacks

extensive_correct.title: Fully customized confirmation dialog

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Not providing required callbacks
incorrect.why_incorrect: ConfirmForm requires both onV (confirm) and onX (cancel) callbacks. Always provide these callbacks to handle user interactions.

symbols.name: DatePicker
symbols.description_one_line: Simple HTML5-based date range picker with from/to date inputs and submit button.

params.name: submit
params.description: Async callback fired when form is submitted. Receives form event. Can be used to validate and send date range to server. Defaults to empty async function.

params.name: formClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the form element. Default provides flex row layout with gaps and center alignment.

params.name: labelsClassName
params.description: CSS classes applied to both label elements.

params.name: inputsClassName
params.description: CSS classes applied to both date input fields.

params.name: buttonClassName
params.description: CSS classes for the submit button. Default provides green background, white text, fixed width and height.

params.name: buttonStyle
params.description: Inline CSS styles for the submit button.

params.name: defaultFrom
params.description: Default value for 'from' date input in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to today's date.

params.name: defaultTo
params.description: Default value for 'to' date input in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to today's date.

params.name: direction
params.description: Text direction ('rtl' or 'ltr'). Defaults to 'rtl' (right-to-left).

params.name: fromText
params.description: Label text for the 'from' date input. Defaults to 'From date'.

params.name: toText
params.description: Label text for the 'to' date input. Defaults to 'To date'.

params.name: buttonText
params.description: Text displayed in submit button. Defaults to 'Search'. Replaced with Loader spinner during submission.

returns.description: Inline form with two date inputs and submit button.

details.what_it_does: Renders a lightweight date range picker form using native HTML5 date inputs (type='date'). Form contains two inline labels with associated date input fields and a submit button. On submission, prevents default, shows loading state, calls submit callback, then hides loading state. Form values are accessible via FormData or by name attributes ('from' and 'to'). Uses moment.js to generate default date values in YYYY-MM-DD format.

minimal_correct.title: Basic date range picker

extensive_correct.title: Customized date picker with styling

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Using async submit without error handling
incorrect.why_incorrect: Always handle errors in submit callbacks. Use try/catch or .catch() to handle failures and inform the user.

details.what_it_does: Renders an accessible date range picker form using react-aria-components DatePicker primitives. Features two calendar-based date selectors (from and to dates) with calendar popover UI for visual date selection. Each date picker shows a text input field with a calendar icon button that opens a popover with a full month calendar view. Date selection automatically updates the input field. Wrapped in I18nProvider with en-GB locale. Supports keyboard navigation, arrow keys for date navigation, and accessibility best practices. On form submit, calls submit callback with loading state management.
details.rendered_ui_description: Inline form containing two date picker sections side-by-side (or stacked based on form layout). Each section has a label and a date input field with an integrated calendar icon button. Clicking the icon opens a popover calendar below the input showing the current month with today highlighted and selected date emphasized. Calendar has accessible keyboard navigation.

minimal_correct.title: Basic calendar date range picker

extensive_correct.title: Fully styled calendar picker with custom styling

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Trying to access form values without proper extraction
incorrect.why_incorrect: DatePicker2 uses react-aria-components DatePicker which has its own internal state. Extract values via FormData API: new FormData(e.currentTarget).get('from') and .get('to').
